definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: China narrowly beat Jordan Sunday night in the Asian Men's basketball championships final, 70-69.
sentences.chinese: 中國男籃在亞錦賽決賽中以70比69一分險勝約旦。

sentences.english: Since 2002, the DPRK team has been kept out of international games.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮男籃上次出現在國際舞臺上還是2002年。

sentences.english: The data of steals showed the weakness of defensive attacking that CMBT had.
sentences.chinese: 搶斷的數據反映出中國男籃防守攻擊性較弱。

sentences.english: Can we say that Yao Ming is the fig leaf created by the Chinese Men's Basketball Team?
sentences.chinese: 難道我們可以說姚明是國家男籃創造出的遮羞布嗎？

sentences.english: All of this was done as part of China's re-engineering of its basketball for the upcoming summer Olympic games.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些都是中國男籃爲了即將到來的奧運會做準備。

sentences.english: All of them were part of the Argentine National Team of Basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的所有人都是阿根廷男籃國家隊的一員。

sentences.english: Chinese basketball is poor at allround aspects, only can depend on height.
sentences.chinese: 中國男籃的差距是全方位的，可以依賴的只有身高。

sentences.english: Jordan Sunday night in the Asian Men's basketball championships final, 70-69.
sentences.chinese: 中國男籃在亞錦賽決賽中以70比69一分險勝約旦。

sentences.english: And of course they'll take on China in the first round.
sentences.chinese: 當然他們第一輪將與中國男籃對決。

definition: (sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
(in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
